titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3053) to amend the Nuclear Waste Policy Act of 1982, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3053) to amend the Nuclear Waste Policy Act of 1982, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 115-665, by Mr. Newhouse.
Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3053 under a structured rule with one hour of debate equally divided and controlled by the Chair and Ranking Member of the Committee on Energy and Commerce.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 143.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 879.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 223 - 189 (Roll no. 173).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 224 - 184, 1 Present (Roll no. 174).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3053) to amend the Nuclear Waste Policy Act of 1982.
